name: Master Piece
reviewBody: for me this is one of those Indian movies who will remain in my mind for long time i have seen this film like 5 times and still i want to see it again, well when there is a big name like Bharat Shah producing a movie with Countries top notch non commercial director Mani Ratnam and the musical genius A.R Rahman and the biggest star in the world with 3 billion plus fan following certainly you don't expect something less. and this movie proves it all that why these people are amongst the best in their fields and about ShahRukh Khan because this movie belongs to him, i still remember i have seen some of his old films stammering and with a very girlish and amateur way of delivering dialogues but this one came as a surprise to me, for me this is his best work till date, i will not try to tell you what is the story of this movie and how it goes all you need is to go and watch and one more thing strange to see its rating 7.5 ? come on guys out of all that stupid movies and cinema we see its worth wasting your money DVD is out a long time ago even it is worth buying do give it a try and i assure you will love it even if you're not a Indian movie buff this one will be a fresh breath of air amongst all those glossy and love and dance cinema a must must must watch 10/10
